QuestData.Title: Walk With The Earth Mother
QuestData.Description: Much has changed outside of Mulgore, $n. The world is torn, and our Horde allies have turned down dark paths. We must guide them. Even in the darkest hour, we will bravely hold our heads high, and honor the Earth Mother in all we do.$B$BYou must go, $n, and be this example. Go to Orgrimmar. Tell Saurfang how the Grimtotem were driven out. Let him know our pride and discipline, our strength and sorrow.$B$BTal at the Skytower will send you on your way. Go in peace, and never forget your people.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Mark of Bloodhoof to High Overlord Saurfang, located in Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.$B$BYou may speak with Tal the Wind Rider Master to travel there, or wait for the zeppelin.
QuestData.CompletionText: What makes you seek the Warchief of the Horde, $r?
QuestData.RewardText:
The Grimtotem have been forced out of Mulgore? You must be a fierce warrior to earn the praise of Baine Bloodhoof. The Horde needs heroes, ones that hold honor in their hearts. Very well, $c. I accept you as one of us.
For the Horde!
